decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed rear dormer would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The proposed front slope roof light would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The proposed front porch would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class D of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class D. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - The proposed extension of a soil vent pipe would consist of any other alteration to the dwelling house within the meaning of Class G of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (Amendment) (No. 2) (England) Order 2008 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class G. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A REAR ROOF EXTENSION; 3 FRONT ROOFLIGHTS; A PORCH
